Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small NearRing Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small NearRing AllSmallNearRing is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic nearring models from orders 2 to 8.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of NearRing formulas(NearRing).
(x + y) + z = x + (y + z).
x + 0 = x.
x + - x = 0.
(x * y) * z = x * (y * z).
(x + y) * z = (x * z) + (y * z).
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
